mediaDisplay.text:
Once you’ve started a slideshow, use the slideshow menu to set up your slideshow effects.
1. After you’ve started the slideshow, press "Menu" on the remote to pause the slideshow and display the Slideshow menu. 2. Use the arrow keys on the remote to select a Slideshow menu option and set your preferences for this slideshow. 3. Repeat this step until you’ve set preferences for each menu option. * Slide Timing: Choose how long to display each image in the slideshow. * Slide Transition: Choose the way one slide is replaced by the next. * Continuous Play vs. Shuffle: Choose to display your images in the order in which they’re stored in the folder or in random order. 3. When you’ve finished your settings, press the Play button on the remote to resume the slideshow with your preferences.
